EmailTemplate.name: 22AugWeb-Digital-Strategies.Invite 3
EmailTemplate.subject: Last chance to register for MBO's Tech webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
There's one day left to join us tomorrow, August 22 at 1 p.m. ET for a webinar titled "Digital Strategies for Independent Professionals: How the Right Tech Tools Can Boost Your Bottom Line <http://info.mbopartners.com/22AugWebDigitalStrategies_RegistrationPage.html> <http://info.mbopartners.com/16MayWebSocialMedia_RegistrationPage.html>." If you can't make our webinar, don't worry! Register <http://info.mbopartners.com/22AugWebDigitalStrategies_RegistrationPage.html>, and we will send you a recording and slides the following week so you can view them at your convenience. ___________________________________ Jaime MacDonell Marketing Manager MBO Partners
t: 703-793-6368 e: jmacdonell@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
